text: Bɨ anɨb ak takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Pen ensel ne Layodisiya binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak, takaw agɨnɨgebin ak ensel ak nop kɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Tap okok mɨdupsek God ne gɨlak ak, yad ke bɨ tap jɨj agak. Yad bɨ takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl, God takaw agup tek kɨdek gɨl, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl nep apin agak. Yad takaw nɨm ak agyokebin agak.
